item.description:
***RALLY FEATURING GOV. SARAH PALIN, PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE BUDDY ROEMER, AND PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE GARY JOHNSON***

Tea Party Express kicks off their 5th national bus tour on August 27, 2011 starting in Napa, CA and will crisscross the country holding rallies in 29 cities. The tour will lead up to the TPX/CNN Tea Party Presidential Debate in Tampa, FL on September 12, 2011. This is your opportunity to hear special guests speakers, including presidential candidates, speak on the issues important to the tea party movement: fiscal responsibility, limited government, and free markets. More information to come on specific locations. For other information please contact rally@teapartyexpress.org and enter the rally location in the subject line or visit http://www.teapartyexpress
item.name: Tea Party Express comes to Manch w/ Palin
